elements.text:
You're at a new grocery store and you're looking for bread. Suddenly you notice that your heart is beating quickly and pounding. 

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I'm scared about this feeling in my chest, but think about all the times my heart has pounded and I've wound up fine.
I'm excited to see what this new grocery store has.
I'm happy that I finally decided to come here.
I'm terrified my heart pounding means something bad is happening.
I'm nervous about my heart, but remember that sometimes my heart beats quickly when I'm excited.
